articles.title: Manu Bhaker reacts after becoming India's flag bearer for closing ceremony at Paris Olympics: ‘I look forward to…’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Manu Bhaker has shared her first reaction after becoming India's flag bearer for the closing ceremony of the Paris Olympics.  | Olympics
articles.content: Star shooter Manu Bhaker has been confirmed as India's flag bearer for the closing ceremony of the Paris Olympics on Sunday. Creating history for India at the grandest stage, Bhaker opened the Olympi… [+1824 chars]

articles.title: Health Talk | Why Hepatitis B elimination in India needs a harder push - Hindustan Times
articles.description: With 254 million people living with chronic HBV globally, including 29.8 million in India, Hepatitis B day emphasises the need for increased awareness and action.
articles.content: Chronic HBV infection can lead to serious complications, including cirrhosis of the liver and liver cancer, which significantly increase the risk of death. According to this year's World Health Organ… [+2514 chars]
